name: Avlard
description:
A game about an alien creature named Avlard that needs to sneak by people to get back home.

Controls

Use mouse to navigate menus and change ingame view angle.

  • WASD - move
  • Q and E - switch between lower and higher speed of movement
  • Shift - Brake
  • Space or LMB - Jump
  • Alt - drop picked up items
  • P - pause
  • (Ctrl - expand sticky radius while holding the key) - is not required to complete the game

Controls are also described in the first level of the game.
